author: jcoleman@thehill.com (Justine Coleman)
title: UN presses for scale-up of coronavirus medicines, vaccines worldwide
description: The United Nations general assembly on Tuesday pressed for a scale-up of coronavirus medicines, vaccines and equipment worldwide as the virus continues to ravage countries. The general assembly requested U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres...
content:
The United Nations general assembly on Tuesday pressed for a scale-up of coronavirus medicines, vaccines and equipment worldwide as the virus continues to ravage countries. 
The general assembly requested U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres to work with … [+1242 chars]
